betaA.title: Beta A
betaA.description: Weight to amplitudes prior, strength (beta) of the penalty, the chi2 penalty is thus `-2 betaA log(P(a |z,TE))`. Negative or zero values => no penalty

betaTE.title: Beta TE
betaTE.description: Weight to templates and ISM parameters (template index and tabulated Ebmv), the chi2 penalty is thus `-2 betaTE log(P(TE|z))`

betaZ.title: Beta Z
betaZ.description: Weight to redshift prior (redshift bins), the chi2 penalty is thus `-2 betaZ log(P(z))`

catalog_dirpath.title: Catalog directory path
catalog_dirpath.description: Absolute path to the calibration file containing the parameters probability, empty string unset all priors
